Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

AiScore is your Live score expert, bringing to you more information, more statistics and a completely new experience on your smartphone. Here you are even informed faster than the TV viewers!

With In-depth coverage of football, basketball, tennis and snooker, AiScore brings you live score,goals, yellow or red cards, H2H, fixtures, match live, team and player stats, standings, lineups and other important stats from English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, UEFA Champions League, NBA, FIBA, Basketball Champions League, ATP tennis, WTA tennis, World Snooker Championship - major or small leagues and competitions all over the world!

TOP HIGHLIGHTS:

*All Games - Follow all today's matches in real time. Also, you can check out the matches on specific day by DateTime Picker.

*Live - Stay up to date with all the latest scores and results from hundreds and thousands of games worldwide. Every score at a glance. Just tap the matchup for Box Score or Lineups, H2H and Match Live.

*Favorites - Choose your favorite team and competition on matchup and always be up-to-date.

*Instant Notification - Get instant notifications of goal, corner, red or yellow card, start, starting lineups and final results for all live or your followed matches. A pop-up window will appear to inform you of score changing when you turn on the "Score Reminder”.

*Leagues - In-depth coverage of leagues, cups and tournaments from over 200 countries. Check out latest rankings, standings, team or player stats and more.

Football: Over 2,600 different football matches, over 37,000 teams (including Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Championship and many more)

Basketball: Over 500 tournaments including FIBA Basketball World Cup, NBA, BCL

Tennis: Complete source for worldwide tennis matches including ATP, WTA

Snooker: Complete source for worldwide snooker matches including World Championship, UK Championship, Masters

*Chatroom - Get connected with other sports fans from all over the world. No game is boring if you can chat live.

*Language - 28 (more will be added)

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

Over 4 millions users rely on BetMines. Follow our daily betting tips for football, get notified by our Live and Prematch scanners, look at statistical trends for the main betting events, analyse team statistics, follow other tipsters bets, test your strategy by creating free virtual football bets, follow livescore and much more!

BetMines is a totally free football betting support application that offers several tools to help you increase your success rate and teach you how to bet!

--- DAILY TIPS ---
We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

--- LIVE AND PRE-MATCH SCANNER ---
BetMines scanners scan every second all football matches and send you alerts every time a match meets your criteria

--- TRENDS ---
Find statistical trends for the main events - like 1X2, Total Goals, Both team to score - for teams with matches in the coming days

--- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ---
Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!


--- TEAMS STATISTICS ---
For each team involved in the match we provide the results of the last 5 matches in general, the last 5 at home and the last 5 away games.
For the last 10 matches of each team we also provide:

- the percentage of results 1.5+,2.5+ and 3.5+ goals, Both team to score, 3 Way Result
- the mean of the corners
- Total goals
- Clean sheet matches

--- LEAGUE STATISTICS ---
For each league we supply:
- Standings
- Percentages of 1.5+,2.5+, 3.5+ goals and both team to score outcomes
- The minutes of the goals
- Average goal per game
- Average of yellow and red cards


--- BETMINES MACHINE ---
It is a tool that allows you to generate bets with a high probability of success taking into account the selected criteria.
You choose the leagues you want to bet on, the type of event (1X2, double chance, under/over , combo and both team to score), the desired odds range, the number of matches and BetMines will generate for you the most likely bet based on the criteria you have chosen.


--- OTHER FEATURES ---
- possibility to choose your favorite leagues
- possibility to follow the results live thanks to a livescore service
- possibility to access the best odds for each event
- possibility of receiving push notifications when our suggested bets are published, when a tipster you follow posts a bet or when the bet you placed is winning.

Follow BetMines football predictions, analyse the statistics provided, follow the best tipsters and create your own winning football bets for FREE!

Please have a look at our Terms of Use:
https://betmines.com/TermsOfUse.html

developer: Mackolik Internet Hizmetleri Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
description:
Transform your football experience with M Scores - trusted by 10M+ fans for lightning-fast updates, live scores and deep match insights for Premier League, LaLiga, Champions League and 1000+ leagues worldwide 

Get team line-ups, live football scores, match results, fixtures, ratings, team and player statistics from thousands of leagues and tournaments in football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, and F1 for free.

The fastest notifications for football live scores! Premier League, LaLiga, UEFA Champions League and more competitions. Get instant goal alerts, match predictions & live stats.

FAST NOTIFICATIONS AND RELIABLE FOOTBALL LIVE SCORES
Get the latest news from games as the ball crosses the line. Reminder alerts for pre-match, kick-off, half-time and full-time results will come to your mobile with instant push notifications. 

SEE WHAT’S RELEVANT TO YOU FIRST
With M Scores, we prioritize your local leagues so that you can see what’s relevant to you first and foremost.

For example: If the user is in the UK, local leagues and tournaments in the United Kingdom, such as the Premier League, will take priority and will be shown first.

PICK YOUR FAVORITE FOOTBALL TEAMS AND PLAYERS
With M Scores you can closely follow your favourite teams and their matches. Get notified about the goals, red cards, half-time, and full-time scores instantly. 

You can also choose your favourite football players and get notifications about them. If your favourite players are in starting line-ups for their respective games, or they score goals, have assists, sub-in or sub-out, we will notify you instantly. 

DETAILED FOOTBALL STATS, FORMATIONS AND LIVE TABLES
Easily access to detailed pre-match, football live score, and post-match statistics.

View formations of the football teams in many important leagues and tournaments such as Premier League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, FIFA World Cup, UEFA European Championship, UEFA Nations League.

Through ‘Live Table’, follow positions of football teams in their respective leagues and tournaments as scores change simultaneously. Will your favourite football team be able to win the Premier League this season?

TEAM COMPARISONS
View and compare several football stats such as recent meetings between opponents, their form, their home and away results.

PLAYER PROFILE PAGES
With our informative player pages, - take a look at players’ careers and get to know them better.

LIVE COMMENTARY
Don’t miss the games you are not able to watch. Follow the games in depth with Live Commentary tabs in match pages.

TRANSFER MARKET NEWS & RUMOURS
Follow all football transfer market updates, news, rumours and confirmations.

M SCORES FORUM
Share your excitement for the match on M Scores Forum. You can like and reply to other users' comments. You can also join the forum with your Google or Facebook accounts.

BASKETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, TENNIS, F1
With M Scores, you can get live basketball, volleyball, and tennis scores just as fast as football! Follow the games with our user-friendly interface. 

With F1, you will have the immersive racing experience with our radar and live timing screens.

Download the M Scores app now and don't miss a thing! All the information and news from the world of sport and live football scores at your fingertip.

FinishTime Passport provides athletes with quick and easy access to a complete registration process at events where FinishTime manages the registration process. Runners, cyclists, triathletes, swimmers or any other potential entrants can quickly and easily ‘late enter’ any event where FinishTime is handling the registration.
No information is saved away from your phone until your entry is processed. Event organisers only have access to information which you provide and which is relevant to the entry process.
You enter the required data within the app on your phone, then you select the event that you would like to enter or register for. The app will create a unique QRCode for that event on your phone which FinishTime then scans and the relevant information is uploaded to the event.
It is quick and safe.
